omens.name: Omen of Abyssal Echoes
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory the next time you reveal Desecrated modifiers you can reroll the options once

omens.name: Omen of Amelioration
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory will prevent 75% of Experience loss when you die

omens.name: Omen of Answered Prayers
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory the next Shrine you click on will grant an additional Effect

omens.name: Omen of Bartering
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next sold item's Gold value will be incorrectly assessed by the Vendor

omens.name: Omen of Catalysing Exaltation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Exalted Orb will consume all Catalyst Quality to increase the chance of the corresponding type of Modifier

omens.name: Omen of Chance
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Chance will not destroy the Item

omens.name: Omen of Chaotic Monsters
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will replace all Modifiers on a Waystone with Modifiers that grant Rare and Magic Monsters

omens.name: Omen of Chaotic Quantity
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will replace all Modifiers on a Waystone with Modifiers that grant Pack Size

omens.name: Omen of Chaotic Rarity
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will replace all Modifiers on a Waystone with Modifiers that grant Item Rarity

omens.name: Omen of Corruption
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Vaal Orb will always result in change

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Alchemy
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Alchemy will result in the maximum number of suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Annulment
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Annulment will remove only suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Coronation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Regal Orb will add only suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Crystallisation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Perfect or Corrupted Essence will remove only Suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Erasure
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will remove only suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Exaltation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Exalted Orb will add only suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Dextral Necromancy
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Desecration attempt will add only suffix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Gambling
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Gamble purchase will have a 50% chance of costing no Gold and not consuming this Omen

omens.name: Omen of Greater Annulment
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Annulment will remove two modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Greater Exaltation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Exalted Orb will add two random modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Homogenising Coronation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Regal Orb will add a Modifier of the same type as an existing Modifier on the Item

omens.name: Omen of Homogenising Exaltation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Exalted Orb will add a Modifier of the same type as an existing Modifier on the Item

omens.name: Omen of Light
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Annulment will remove only Desecrated modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Putrefaction
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Desecration attempt will replace all modifiers on the item creating an item with up to 6 Desecrated modifiers and Corrupting the item

omens.name: Omen of Recombination
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Recombination is Lucky

omens.name: Omen of Refreshment
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory will fully recover your flask and charm charges when you reach Low Life

omens.name: Omen of Reinforcements
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory the next Rogue Exile you encounter will summon an ally

omens.name: Omen of Resurgence
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory fully recover your Life, Mana and Energy Shield when you reach Low Life

omens.name: Omen of Sanctification
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Divine Orb used on a Rare item will Sanctify it

omens.name: Omen of Secret Compartments
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory the next Strongbox you click on will be reopenable

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Alchemy
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Alchemy will result in the maximum number of prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Annulment
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Annulment will remove only prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Coronation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Regal Orb will add only prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Crystallisation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Perfect or Corrupted Essence will remove only Prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Erasure
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will remove only prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Exaltation
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Exalted Orb will add only prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of Sinistral Necromancy
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Desecration attempt will add only prefix modifiers

omens.name: Omen of the Ancients
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Orb of Chance will upgrade the Item to a random Unique of the same Item Class

omens.name: Omen of the Blackblooded
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Weapon or Jewellery Desecration attempt will guarantee a random Kurgal modifier

omens.name: Omen of the Blessed
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Divine Orb will only reroll Implicit Modifiers

omens.name: Omen of the Hunt
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory the next Possessed monster you kill will release its Azmeri Spirit

omens.name: Omen of the Liege
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Weapon or Jewellery Desecration attempt will guarantee a random Amanamu modifier

omens.name: Omen of the Sovereign
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Weapon or Jewellery Desecration attempt will guarantee a random Ulaman modifier

omens.name: Omen of Whittling
explicitMods: While this item is active in your inventory your next Chaos Orb will remove the lowest level modifier
